explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Aramark's documentation indicates governance over AI deployment, such as for its Culinary Co-Pilot tool. A help page mentions "AI-driven initiatives" and "decision-making," referencing a focus on foundational governance for AI systems. Furthermore, a proxy statement details the deployment of AI for cost savings in procurement and optimizing supplier negotiations, while a press release implies governance over AI-driven processes by highlighting the Mosaic AI engine's role in powering decision-making and delivering customized insights.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It highlights the AI tool's role in decision-making by synthesizing various data sources, demonstrating transparency in its operational use case and application. The press release also explains the AI's use of algorithms for menu creation and supply chain management, indicating governance over AI deployment and transparency in its mechanisms.
relevant_sources.title: Aramark Strengthens Industry Leadership with Proprietary New AI Tool (Culinary Co-Pilot)

relevant_sources.summary: This help page for Aramark's "DataMark — Advanced Data Intelligence Platform" provides evidence for **governance** and **transparency**. The document supports governance by mentioning "AI-driven initiatives" and "decision-making," indicating a focus on foundational governance for AI systems. It also implies transparency and governance by describing the platform's AI/ML applications and their capabilities.
relevant_sources.title: DataMark — Advanced Data Intelligence Platform

relevant_sources.summary: This Aramark DEF 14A Proxy Statement provides evidence for **governance** and **transparency**. The document supports governance by detailing the deployment of AI for cost savings in procurement and optimizing supplier negotiations. Transparency is evidenced by the mention of AI use cases, such as Hospitality IQ for menu planning and Global Supply Chain AI for spend aggregation, which implies the disclosure of AI capabilities and applications.
relevant_sources.title: Aramark DEF 14A Proxy Statement (December 2025)

relevant_sources.summary: This press release for Aramark's Mosaic AI platform provides evidence for **governance** and **transparency**. The announcement highlights the AI engine's role in powering decision-making for significant annual purchases and delivering customized insights, which implies a level of governance over AI-driven processes. Furthermore, the emphasis on real-time supply chain data and actionable insights available to clients supports the transparency pillar by showcasing how the platform's capabilities and offerings are made accessible.
relevant_sources.title: Aramark introduces Mosaic: Award-winning AI Supply Chain Platform

oversight.path_to_improvement: Document human review processes for AI-assisted decisions (built or vendor AI).

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.findings: Aramark demonstrates transparency by highlighting the operational use cases and mechanisms of its AI tools, such as the Culinary Co-Pilot, which synthesizes data for decision-making and uses algorithms for menu creation and supply chain management. Documentation describes the capabilities of AI/ML applications like DataMark and mentions specific AI use cases such as Hospitality IQ and Global Supply Chain AI, implying disclosure of their capabilities and applications. Furthermore, a press release showcases how the Mosaic AI platform's capabilities and offerings, including real-time supply chain data and actionable insights, are made accessible to clients.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Publish detailed documentation (model cards, system specs) for AI systems deployed.

summary.overall_findings: Drawing from 10 publicly available sources, Aramark's published materials address 2 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars, specifically transparency and governance. Transparency is demonstrated through press releases highlighting an AI tool's role in decision-making by synthesizing various data sources and explaining its use of algorithms for menu creation and supply chain management. Governance is indicated by a press release mentioning AI deployment for tools like Culinary Co-Pilot and a help page referencing "AI-driven initiatives" and "decision-making." No qualifying public evidence was found for the majority of the 7 evaluated pillars.
